entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022
